Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Interface Unit

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Damageable, Movable, Originator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUnit, Mech, Vehicle
    public interface Unit
extends Movable, Damageable, Originator
    Unit interface.
    See Also:
    Movable, Damageable, Originator
